modName: Perkus Maximus Warforged Ebony Blade Enchantment
descriptionHtml:
You can upgrade your Ebony Blade to the "warforged" state. But it loses it's magic effect to drain health. I made a small mod, which lets you upgrade your Ebony Blade to the "warforged" state and keep the health drain enchantment.

I think it is lorefriendly that you can not destroy daedric artifacts and you should upgrade them.

Load the ESP after the PerMa master, the 3 Modules and Patchus Maxiums.


Have fun
author: Stefan
